abstract: Intel and Microsoft said that they planned to finance two groups of university researchers to start over and design a new generation of computing systems.
snippet: Intel and Microsoft said that they planned to finance two groups of university researchers to start over and design a new generation of computing systems.
lead_paragraph: Intel and Microsoft said Tuesday that they planned to finance two groups of university researchers to start over and design a new generation of computing systems intended to break the industry out of a technological cul-de-sac that threatens to end decades of performance increases in computers.

headline.main: Industry Giants Try to Break Computing’s Dead End
headline.print_headline: Industry Giants Try to Break Computing’s Dead End

abstract: Intel and Microsoft said Tuesday that they planned to finance two groups of university researchers to start over and design a new generation of computing systems intended to break the industry out of a technological cul-de-sac that threatens to end decades of performance increases in computers.
